local_intent: Perceive or rescan for the Pepsi can, align, ensure gripper open, push 0.20 m at 90 deg, then retreat, pause, and verify the can was not grasped.
assumptions: Push path at 90 deg is free of obstacles
Can is reachable and alignment tolerance of 0.01 m is achievable
coherence_with_global: Implements the push phase with visibility check and rescan, alignment, open gripper, push (0.20 m at 90 deg), retreat, and brief wait, consistent with the GLOBAL_BT and task description.
